## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G02390](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G02390)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATGPAT2, GPAT2</u>
- **Gene Name:** GLYCEROL-3-PHOSPHATE sn-2-ACYLTRANSFERASE 2, GLYCEROL-3-PHOSPHATE sn-2-ACYLTRANSFERASE 2
- **Description:**   glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2204818
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
